meanings.definition: A genus of plants in the mallow family, including the common mallow.
meanings.sent1: The sida plant has pretty flowers.
meanings.sent2: I saw a sida growing in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The sida plant waved at me in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: The sida plant stood tall like a tiny tree.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the sida flower brightened the garden.
